content.prompt: The most likely reason basalt was used as the primary building material at Nan Madol was due to its

choices.label: symbolic connection with the strength of the ruling dynasty
dark coloration being associated with death and mourning
lightweight nature making it easy to carve and transport
ability to break naturally into columnar forms ideal for construction
